price: Isaan warra salaata (haqaan) sagadaniifi zakaas kennataniidha. Isaan isaanumatu Aakhiraa dhugoomsa.
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ يُقِيمُونَ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَيُؤۡتُونَ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ وَهُم بِٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ هُمۡ يُوقِنُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: alladhīna yuqīmūna al-ṣalata wayu'tūna al-zakata wahum bil-ākhirati hum yūqinūna
